about_the_game:
The Expeditions: Viking Original Game Soundtrack by critically acclaimed composer Knut Avenstroup Haugen

Track List:

01 Prologue Through the Mist
02 A Thegn s Burden
03 The Ocean Beckons
04 Heart of Midgardr
05 Among Kinsfolk
06 Favoured by Thorr
07 Roots of Yggdrasil
08 Beneath the Stars
09 Odinn s Call
10 Wings of the Morrigan
11 Homestead
12 Charge of the Einherjar
13 Vales of Britannia
14 Heather and Thyme
15 Epilogue Pax Romana


Digital Art Book featuring concept art, sketches, and key art from the development of Expeditions: Viking.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q9400 2.66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660
